Entry.Name: Accepting All SSL Certificates
Entry.Description: The SSLSocket/SSLFactory accepts all certificates or NonValidatingSSLSocketFactory/setDefaultHostnameVerifier/NullHostnameVerifier is present.

Mitigation.Textual: You should set a certificate and properly config this line (or remove it), so nobody can truly use self-signed certificates, changing the SSLSocket/SSLFactory to accept trusted certificates or by removing NonValidatingSSLSocketFactory/setDefaultHostnameVerifier/NullHostnameVerifier.
